glsa.title: Wireshark: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Wireshark.

background.p: Wireshark is a versatile network protocol analyzer.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in the Daintree SNA file parser, the SMB, SMB2, IPMI, and DOCSIS dissectors. For further information please consult the CVE entries referenced below.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service and possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted packets or malformed packet trace files.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Wireshark users should upgrade to the latest version:
